root.name: Cross Days
root.description: PlotCross Days is the story of Yuuki Ashikaga, a 1st year student at Sakakino Academy. While in the library he meets a girl, by the name of Katsura Kotonoha, who he quickly falls in love with and pursues despite the fact that she already has a boyfriend. Soon after, Yuuki meets a girl named roka Kitsuregawa t hrough his sister, who is in love with him, but afraid to show it. Out of jealousy for Katsura, she tells Tuuki that she likes Katsura's boyfriend Makoto Itou. After hearing this, Yuuki approaches Katsura and asks her if she knows about this.
